title: The day of the Lord is at hand

verses.text:
Gather ye, gather ye, angels of God—
Freedom, and mercy, and truth;
Come! for the earth is grown coward and old,
Come down, and renew us her youth!
The fever of thought and the fever of blood
Must be quenched by the rain of the coming flood,
And the day of the Lord is at hand.

Gather ye, gather ye, hounds of hell—
Hunger, and murder, and lust;
Come! for earth's harvest is ready to reap,
Come down, and thresh out the dust!
The mills of God grind slowly, but sure;
The wicked is taken in his own lure,
And the day of the Lord is at hand.

Gather ye, gather ye, kings of the earth,
The sickle is sharpened to reap;
Each tree that brings not forth good fruit
Shall be cast in the fire to weep.
The cup of the Lord shall be drained to the dregs,
And the day of the Lord is at hand.
